-- Generated by Oracle SQL Developer Data Modeler 23.1.0.087.0806
--   at:        2024-05-15 12:11:10 EEST
--   site:      Oracle Database 12c
--   type:      Oracle Database 12c



-- predefined type, no DDL - MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY

-- predefined type, no DDL - XMLTYPE

CREATE TABLE car (
    carid          INTEGER NOT NULL,
    model          VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    cartype_typeid INTEGER NOT NULL,
    carsize_sizeid INTEGER NOT NULL,
    seats          INTEGER NOT NULL,
    doors          INTEGER NOT NULL,
    conventional   NUMBER NOT NULL,
    priceperday    FLOAT NOT NULL,
    licenseplate   VARCHAR2(30),
    store_storeid  INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE car ADD CONSTRAINT car_pk PRIMARY KEY ( carid );

CREATE TABLE carsize (
    sizeid INTEGER NOT NULL,
    "size" VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE carsize ADD CONSTRAINT carsize_pk PRIMARY KEY ( sizeid );

CREATE TABLE cartype (
    typeid INTEGER NOT NULL,
    type   VARCHAR2(40) NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE cartype ADD CONSTRAINT cartype_pk PRIMARY KEY ( typeid );

CREATE TABLE customer (
    driverlicense   VARCHAR2(40) NOT NULL,
    firstname       VARCHAR2(40) NOT NULL,
    lastname        VARCHAR2(40) NOT NULL,
    email           VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    cellphonenumber VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL,
    homephonenumber VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE customer ADD CONSTRAINT customer_pk PRIMARY KEY ( driverlicense );

CREATE TABLE location (
    locationid    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    addressname   VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    addressnumber VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL,
    postalcode    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    store_storeid INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE location ADD CONSTRAINT location_pk PRIMARY KEY ( locationid );

CREATE TABLE rent (
    rentid                 INTEGER NOT NULL,
    customer_driverlicense VARCHAR2(40) NOT NULL,
    car_carid              INTEGER NOT NULL,
    location_locationid    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    deliverydate           DATE NOT NULL,
    delivered              NUMBER NOT NULL,
    location_locationid2   INTEGER NOT NULL,
    returndate             DATE NOT NULL,
    returned               NUMBER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE rent ADD CONSTRAINT rent_pk PRIMARY KEY ( rentid );

CREATE TABLE store (
    storeid       INTEGER NOT NULL,
    city          VARCHAR2(40) NOT NULL,
    addressname   VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    addressnumber VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL,
    postalcode    INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE store ADD CONSTRAINT store_pk PRIMARY KEY ( storeid );

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_carsize_fk FOREIGN KEY ( carsize_sizeid )
        REFERENCES carsize ( sizeid );

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_cartype_fk FOREIGN KEY ( cartype_typeid )
        REFERENCES cartype ( typeid );

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_store_fk FOREIGN KEY ( store_storeid )
        REFERENCES store ( storeid );

ALTER TABLE location
    ADD CONSTRAINT location_store_fk FOREIGN KEY ( store_storeid )
        REFERENCES store ( storeid );

ALTER TABLE rent
    ADD CONSTRAINT rent_car_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_carid )
        REFERENCES car ( carid );

ALTER TABLE rent
    ADD CONSTRAINT rent_customer_fk FOREIGN KEY ( customer_driverlicense )
        REFERENCES customer ( driverlicense );

ALTER TABLE rent
    ADD CONSTRAINT rent_location_fk FOREIGN KEY ( location_locationid )
        REFERENCES location ( locationid );

ALTER TABLE rent
    ADD CONSTRAINT rent_location_fkv2 FOREIGN KEY ( location_locationid2 )
        REFERENCES location ( locationid );

CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER fkntm_car BEFORE
    UPDATE OF cartype_typeid, carsize_sizeid ON car
BEGIN
    raise_application_error(-20225, 'Non Transferable FK constraint  on table car is violated');
END;
/

CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER fkntm_rent BEFORE
    UPDATE OF customer_driverlicense, car_carid ON rent
BEGIN
    raise_application_error(-20225, 'Non Transferable FK constraint  on table rent is violated');
END;
/
